review: my appointment was at      a m   the doctor did not actually show up to the clinic and into the exam room until      a m  while i do understand and have experienced the known fact that doctors even though have a schedule can t always be in the exam room right on schedule  but to not actually show up to the actual clinic that i can say i ve never experienced   i was not given the opportunity to re schedule my appointment  the receptionist never came to check in on me nor to let me know the doctor was running late by the time he showed up i was extremely frustrated  the lack of professionalism and lack of concern for my time is just not acceptable in my book   if the receptionist had said  listen  the doctor is running late would you like to reschedule and let me decide if i want to stay and wait or reschedule by far better   i went in to renew a prescription for my inner ear problem and to get fmla paper work filled out it was getting ready to expire  the doctor used a marker which bled through he apologized  which was fine  i faxed the office a new one he stated he would get it to me that day  friday    i finally had to call friday at       office is closed   i called the pueblo office  they stated no they are opened till   i explained i got the answering machine and that s what it stated   she put me on hold  called the canon office   got back on line with me and said the doctor would get it to me yet that evening   i had to call back tuesday because i hadn t received it   spoke with receptionist and finally got it that afternoon   so i send it to risk management for department of corrections  my employer  they explained that it was extremely vague and asked me to contact my doctor and ask that he change the wording   they gave me wording from my last one i called the office gave the receptionist the information   well  he sends me an email  doesn t call to discuss this  sends an email   he closes his email to me  if patient would like to discuss her concerns she can make an appointment    are you kidding me   i have the fmla for job protection i can tell you how much i used my fmla last year    hours   i am not asking for him to lie on this
label: Extreme
